name: Eremite Scorching Loremaster
title: "Poetry and Secret Histories" Eremite Scorching Loremaster
desc: Those who still remember will never betray the spirit of the sands yet flowing through their veins.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Eremite Scorching Loremaster

skills.name: Blazing Strike
skills.desc: Deals 3 Pyro DMG, creates 1 stack of Scorpion Blessing.

skills.name: Spirit of Omen's Awakening: Pyro Scorpion
skills.desc: Deals 3 Pyro DMG. Once each Match, add 1 Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion card to your Hand. (Characters with Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion equipped can use the Technique: Burning Assault)

skills.name: Spirit of Omen's Power
skills.desc: (Passive) After this character takes DMG: If this character has no more than 7 HP, they gain 1 Energy. (Once per Round)
